column4: I'm Appreciating the UberGeek who can help me get a BIOS Firmware update on a gateway laptop.
AnyOne?
most BIOS updates are done with a dos bootdisk, not a linux thing.
llutz- Hi Read a tutorial on ubuntu forum and am confused- A Newb
llutz- know of a tutorial just for beginners?
what brand/type is your laptop?
a gateway MT3700
http://support.gateway.com/us/en/product/default.aspx?tab=1&modelId=3094
Also New 2 IRC...Thanx I'll Hit that link - Luv.
I'm A NEW Newb!
ok i was at that link an hour ago AND---
llutz- I'm on someones mac who's not sure what a mouse is, AND-
download/extract the .zip, burn it onto a cdr, chose "create bootable media" and use the img-file from "boot.images" as boot-image
ask some mac users how to do that on apple stuff
I have a quirky VERY problematic install of ubuntu on it NOW - AND -
would like to update the BIOS b4 clean install to really give Ubuntu a Fair Shake...
i already showed you a way to go
- Isn't it 4 windows only? Gateway says no support for linux Sooo-
some forum posts said that THAT tutorial with freedos fried their box - I'm just a little scared!
freeman, Apparently I need 2B brave! Does Anyone Know THE...
BEST TUTORIAL EVER 4  Bios Flashing 4 a Beginner. I have no thumb drives but can do a disc! So???
download/extract the .zip, burn it onto a cdr, chose "create bootable media" and use the img-file from "boot.images" as boot-image
and tbh, bios-updating is nothing a beginner should do and offtopic here.
